price: Sana dağlardan soruyorlar. De ki: "Rabbim onları un ufak edecektir."
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
